text:
@RepAdamSchiff REMOVE HIM & @VP & BARR NOW!

-TREASON
-ABUSE OF POWER
-CRIMES AGAINST HUMANITY
-CORRUPTION

DO I NEED BIGGER FONTS?

@HouseDemocrats @HouseGOP @RepAdamSchiff @SpeakerPelosi @MSNBC @CNBC @CNN @ABC @CBS #COVID19 #coronavirus #TRE45ON #TraitorInChief #TrumpResignNow
